column4: Hi. I'm using nVidia drivers on my ubuntu, and I'm having problems switching to any console using ctrl+alt+[number]  and if I kill X. The screen just goes black. Any ideas?
do you run with vga= option or splash?
try turning it off on 1 boot see if it fixes it
In any case I would like to keep the splash if possible. Do you know how I can change the resolution of console?
vga=# will make console differnt resolutions
Where can I find a list of #? ;)
not sure atm i know 791 = 1024x768 16bit and same with vga=792 think this one is 24bit
Hum. Do you know if there exists one for 1280x800? This is a widescreen
I just ran vbetest here, and it didn't mention 1280x800 :(

Sort of worked. The mode I entered didn't work, but I got a list of new ones (based on how many rows og columns of text I think), and now I can switch between X11 and console. Anyway, would you throw me the URL again?
